channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-3507] Some of the tests are not deterministic
item.summary: Some of the tests are not deterministic

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Integrated in Hive-trunk-h0.21 #1698 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/Hive-trunk-h0.21/1698/)
HIVE-3507 Some of the tests are not deterministic
(Namit Jain via Carl Steinbach)

Summary: HIVE-3507 Some of the tests are not deterministic

Test Plan: reran the changed tests

Differential Revision: https://reviews.facebook.net/D5655 (Revision 1390277)

Result = FAILURE
